turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to get a coffee for pickup at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a an espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti cherry mocha espresso with 2% milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks. Is there a Starbucks in Key West, Florida?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, there are a few starbucks in key west, florida.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you list them for me?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is one at 2500 N Roosevelt Blvd, one at 430 Duval St, another 431 Front Street Unit #6 & 7 and another store at 3820 N Roosevelt Blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place my order at the North Roosevelt Boulevard location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 3820 N Roosevelt Blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all I need, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye bye!
